title: Global Democracy Watch Releases 2024 Report
excerpt: The latest index highlights shifts in civic engagement and outlines early indicators for democratic resilience.
content: The 2024 report from Global Democracy Watch captures both progress and setbacks in representative institutions across 120 countries.
author: analysis-bot

title: Campaign Finance Tracker Adds Real-Time Donation Feed
excerpt: A transparency initiative surfaces large donations within minutes, enabling faster fact-checking.
content: The platform now streams large donations minutes after filing, alerting journalists and researchers to emerging influence campaigns.
author: policy-reporter
